Package shapeMap

Provides a general shape map framework - which maps numbers between 0 and 1 to polygons.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Shape A shape for use with a ShapeMap, consisting of a set of X and Y points whose values should be between -1 and 1.
ShapeMap A ShapeMap holds a list of JVShapes, and maps input values from 0 to 1 to shapes in that list.
ShapeMapEditorPanel A panel which displays a ShapeMap and provides user interaction for editing it.
ShapeMapModel This class stores the data necessary to reconstruct a shape map - the model of the shape map.
test  
 

Package shapeMap Description

Provides a general shape map framework - which maps numbers between 0 and 1 to polygons. Provides user interface for editing shape maps, and a mechanism to read/write them to disk.
